document.full_text: the miami heat won their first nba title by defeating the dallas mavericks in the 2006 nba finals. the 2011 finals is a rematch.
document.title: 2011 nba finals a rematch of 2006 won by the miami heat
lines_and_colors: the miami heat won their first nba title by defeating the dallas mavericks in the 2006 nba finals. the 2011 finals is a rematch.
